full_summary:
# Feasibility Study
### From: [Fisheries and Oceans Canada](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fisheries_and_Oceans_Canada)
### Published: 2023-02-08
### Deadline: 2023-02-24

Fisheries and Oceans Canada invites qualified contractors to submit proposals for a Feasibility Study to support the evaluation of a potential feasibility project for the LL733 Squirrel Island Rear Range Aid to Navigation site.

## Bid Details
*   **Procurement Reference Number**: PW-23-01025070
*   **Solicitation Number**: 30003519
*   **Competition Type**: Competitive - Open Bidding

## Project Description

The main objective of this Feasibility Study is to provide the Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO) with information and an estimated cost difference of each option listed in the project's Scope of Work. This will enable DFO to make an informed decision for moving forward with the project.

## Requirements

*   A feasibility study to evaluate a potential project for the LL733 Squirrel Island Rear Range Aid to Navigation site
*   Provide information and estimated cost difference of each option listed in the project's Scope of Work
*   Contract duration: approximately 5 months (2023-03-17 to 2023-09-01)

## Documents

You can download the contract documents from [Canada Buys](https://buyandsell.gc.ca/index.aspx?catname=). The following attachments are available:
*   [Feasibility Study Services - English](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/02/08/71c003e45a280a773568ec34d655e460/pr_30003519_-_rfp_-_ll733_feasibility_study_services_-_english.pdf)
*   [Appendix C - Figure 10 30 Quebec Tower](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/02/08/c83d1b84596a5f0e56db28b5fc1faa25/pr_30003519_-_appendix_c_-_figure_10_30_quebec_tower.pdf)
*   [Appendix E - Figure 1 Geotech Report](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/02/08/b9badf8824092927773a50392049dce8/pr
